about.title: about
description: I'm a Full Stack Developer with 4+ years of experience based in Faridabad, India. I specialize in building scalable web applications, payment gateways, and admin panels using modern technologies.

My expertise includes Laravel, Node.js, React.js, Angular, and AWS. I'm passionate about optimizing performance and creating exceptional user experiences. I've helped various clients establish their digital presence and always strive to learn about the newest technologies and frameworks.

contacts.title: contacts
contacts.text: I'm interested in freelance opportunities and full-time positions. However, if you have other requests or questions, don't hesitate to contact me
